sermons.title: Freedom from Bondages
sermons.preacher_description:
Lou Sutera ( - )
Listen to freely downloadable audio sermons by the speaker Lou Sutera in mp3 format. Twin brothers Used of God in revival since 1971. Single and joint church revival ministries usually two and one-half weeks in length. Characterized by straight-forward preaching, visual presentations, follow-through teaching, personal counselling by lay-team workers, etc. Crusades include sessions for men, ladies, youth, children, church leaders and pastoral staffs.
